results.content: So far the course has been super interesting and immersing me at the right pace. Really enjoyed learning the fundamentals about the internet and excited to get into the deeper developing courses later on in this course! His accent is also super cool, it's like Crocodile Dundee is narrating the course :)

results.content: I’m only up to section 4, but so far I’ve learned A LOT. Really clear explanations and the drawing pad is very helpful to get the point across. Thanks Steve

results.content: This is awesome, the iPad is a nice touch. Can’t believe I didn’t have any understanding of how the internet does work…

results.content: Couldn't tell you the first thing about the internet up until now. The way Steve genuinely uncomplicates difficult concepts for beginners like myself to grasp is second to none. Very happy with this

results.content: This is a really good course. Everything i covered really thoroughly and made super simple to understand.
results.content_html: This is a really good course. Everything i covered really thoroughly and made super simple to understand.

results.content: Have followed a lot of open source/free content on learning to code, and this course has topped all of that. The host (Steve) presents the course in a down to earth manner - avoiding jargon you don’t understand where possible. Course structure is logical, and I feel I sharpened my skills/knowledge faster than I would have by trying to find this info myself. Great course! Feels personal with Aussie accent and demeanour too, haha

results.content: Clear content presented in an easy to understand way, plenty of additional resources across sections as well. Great job!!

results.content:
Steve has set up a great course with logical progression from the very basics all the way to mastering basic front end development. 
I had to make a few queries about some extensions of the concepts in this course and he was very quick to respond on discord. 
I am looking forward to hopefully seeing more courses from Steve in the future.
